ResearchProjectDef.label: Molecular Nutrient Resequencing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of Replimat systems, advanced versions of nutrient paste dispensers that convert raw nutritive feedstock into a wider variety of high quality meals. Also automatically lays nutrient feedstock pipelines along existing power conduit networks.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You now have the technology to build a Replimat system.

A typical Replimat setup requires:

 -One Replimat Computer, to control the entire system
 -One (or more) Replimat Hoppers(s), to convert raw food into nutrient feedstock
 -One (or more) Replimat Feedstock Tanks(s), to store the nutrient feedstock
 -One (or more) Replimat Terminal(s), to serve meals to your colonists

However, each Replimat Computer requires a special Isolinear Computing Module component. You can collect Isolinear Computing Modules several ways:

 -Orbital or caravan exotic goods traders sell Isolinear Computing Modules. Invite or wait for them.
 -Some quests are rewarded with Isolinear Computing Modules.
 -Disassemble an AI persona core to extract an Isolinear Computing Module (along with various other components).

Once you have built a Replimat Computer, you can connect it to multiple Hoppers, Tanks and Terminals via the same power grid to build a comprehensive Replimat system.
